segments.text: How was your trip to Brazil ? Did you learn anything ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had no idea how seriously that country takes soccer !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . In the middle of their streets there are parks , big soccer fields as far as you can see .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's not all . They use them ! Every night men , women , children all out there till 3 and 4 a . m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know how they function the next day ! It's like they eat and breathe soccer !
segments.speaker: S2
